reference_a:
@article{neubauer2021,
  title = {A little autonomy support goes a long way: {{Daily}} autonomy-supportive parenting, child well-being, parental need fulfillment, and change in child, family, and parent adjustment across the adaptation to the {{COVID-19}} pandemic},
  shorttitle = {A little autonomy support goes a long way},
  author = {Neubauer, Andreas B. and Schmidt, Andrea and Kramer, Andrea C. and Schmiedek, Florian},
  date = {2021},
  journaltitle = {Child Development},
  volume = {92},
  number = {5},
  pages = {1679--1697},
  issn = {1467-8624},
  doi = {10.1111/cdev.13515}
}
participants: adults living in a household with a schoolchild
additional_comments: data from the PACO project; for some Likert questions, -1 indicates that the question could not be answered

features.name: sleep_quality
features.coding:
How did you sleep last night? 
1= very poorly 
7= very well
features.details: How did you sleep last night?

features.name: school_new_material
features.coding:
Did your child receive learning materials or tasks from school today? 
1= yes  
2= no 
3= don’t know
features.details: Did your child receive learning materials or tasks from school today?

features.name: school_work_today
features.coding:
Has your child worked on materials or tasks today for school? This either refers to tasks designed for this particular day, or tasks that can be worked on over several days. 
1= yes  
2= no  
3= don’t know
features.details: Has your child worked on materials or tasks today for school? This either refers to tasks designed for this particular day, or tasks that can be worked on over several days.

features.name: difficulty_school_work
features.coding:
My child thought the learning material or tasks for today were... 
1= too easy
7= too difficult  
-1= I cannot say today
features.details: My child thought the learning material or tasks for today were...
features.labels:
1= too easy
7= too difficult  
-1= I cannot say today

features.name: volume_school_work
features.coding:
My child thought the learning material or tasks for today were... 
1= too little
7= too much
-1= I cannot say today
features.details: My child thought the learning material or tasks for today were...
features.labels:
1= too little
7= too much
-1= I cannot say today

features.name: school_work_hours
features.coding: approximately... hours and

features.name: school_work_minutes
features.coding: ... minutes

features.name: school_work_comprehensible
features.coding:
My child thought today's learning material or tasks were easy to understand. 
1= completely disagree 
7= completely agree 
-1= I cannot say today
features.details: My child thought today's learning material or tasks were easy to understand.
features.labels:
1= completely disagree 
7= completely agree 
-1= I cannot say today

features.name: school_work_independent
features.coding:
My child worked on the learning material or tasks without problem today, on his/her own.
1= completely disagree 
7= completely agree 
-1= I cannot say today
features.details: My child worked on the learning material or tasks without problem today, on his/her own.
features.labels:
1= completely disagree 
7= completely agree 
-1= I cannot say today

features.name: school_work_needed_support
features.coding:
My child needed a lot of support while working on the learning material or tasks today.
1= completely disagree 
7= completely agree 
-1= I cannot say today
features.details: My child needed a lot of support while working on the learning material or tasks today.
features.labels:
1= completely disagree 
7= completely agree 
-1= I cannot say today

features.name: school_work_joy
features.coding:
My child really enjoyed working on the learning material or tasks today.
1= completely disagree 
7= completely agree 
-1= I cannot say today
features.details: My child really enjoyed working on the learning material or tasks today.
features.labels:
1= completely disagree 
7= completely agree 
-1= I cannot say today
features.construct: enjoy, positive affect, affect, school, education

features.name: school_work_effort
features.coding:
My child invested a lot of effort in working on the learning material or tasks today.
1= completely disagree 
7= completely agree 
-1= I cannot say today
features.details: My child invested a lot of effort in working on the learning material or tasks today.
features.labels:
1= completely disagree 
7= completely agree 
-1= I cannot say today

features.name: time_with_child_hours
features.coding: Today, I spent about. ... hours

features.name: time_with_child_minutes
features.coding: and ... minutes with my child.

features.name: parenting_fun
features.coding:
My child and I had fun together today. 
1= completely disagree 
7= completely agree
features.details: My child and I had fun together today.

features.name: parenting_talked_worries
features.coding:
I talked to my child about his / her thoughts and worries today. 
1= completely disagree 
7= completely agree
features.details: I talked to my child about his / her thoughts and worries today.

features.name: parenting_assert_difficult
features.coding:
I found it hard to assert myself with respect to my child today.
1= completely disagree 
7= completely agree
features.details: I found it hard to assert myself with respect to my child today.

features.name: parenting_drained_energy
features.coding:
Looking after my child cost me a lot of energy today.
1= completely disagree 
7= completely agree
features.details: Looking after my child cost me a lot of energy today.

features.name: parenting_disagreements
features.coding:
My child and I had some disagreement today.
1= completely disagree 
7= completely agree
features.details: My child and I had some disagreement today.

features.name: parenting_child_decide
features.coding:
As far as possible, I let my child decide today what he / she wanted to do.
1= completely disagree 
7= completely agree
features.details: As far as possible, I let my child decide today what he / she wanted to do.

features.name: parenting_child_liked
features.coding:
As far as possible, my child was able to do what he or she liked today.
1= completely disagree 
7= completely agree
features.details: As far as possible, my child was able to do what he or she liked today.

features.name: parenting_told_what_to_do
features.coding:
I told my child several times today what he or she was supposed to do.
1= completely disagree 
7= completely agree
features.details: I told my child several times today what he or she was supposed to do.

features.name: parenting_explained_why
features.coding:
I explained to my child today why he or she should do certain things.
1= completely disagree 
7= completely agree
features.details: I explained to my child today why he or she should do certain things.

features.name: parenting_explained_why_not
features.description: Explained why child should not do
features.coding:
I explained to my child today why he or she should not do certain things.
1= completely disagree 
7= completely agree
features.details: I explained to my child today why he or she should not do certain things.

features.name: activities_total
features.coding: You will find a list of activities below. Please mark the activities you pursued today. Please state the duration of pursuit for the activity, too. You can state half or quarter hours as well (e.g., 0.5 or 5.25).
features.details: You will find a list of activities below. Please mark the activities you pursued today. Please state the duration of pursuit for the activity, too. You can state half or quarter hours as well (e.g., 0.5 or 5.25).

features.name: stressor_argument
features.coding:
Did you experience a conflict or disagreement with someone today? 
1= no  
2= yes
features.details: Did you experience a conflict or disagreement with someone today?
features.construct: social conflict, argument, social stress, daily stressors

features.coding:
Did a family member or friend experience something negative that upset or irritated you?
1= no  
2= yes
features.details: Did a family member or friend experience something negative that upset or irritated you?

2= yes

features.name: worry_many_things
features.coding:
Today, I was worried about a lot of things. 
1 = completely disagree 
7 = completely agree
features.details: Today, I was worried about a lot of things.
features.source: Ambulatory Worry Scale
features.construct: worry, negative affect, affect, neuroticism, big five

features.name: worry_bothered
features.coding:
Today, my worries really bothered me.
1 = completely disagree 
7 = completely agree
features.details: Today, my worries really bothered me.
features.source: Ambulatory Worry Scale
features.construct: worry, negative affect, affect, neuroticism, big five

features.name: worry_might_happen
features.coding:
Today, I worried about things that might happen.
1 = completely disagree 
7 = completely agree
features.details: Today, I worried about things that might happen.
features.source: Ambulatory Worry Scale
features.construct: worry, negative affect, affect, neuroticism, big five

features.name: worry_cant_get_out_head
features.coding:
Today, I couldn’t get my worries out of my head.
1 = completely disagree 
7 = completely agree
features.details: Today, I couldn’t get my worries out of my head.
features.source: Ambulatory Worry Scale
features.construct: worry, rumination, negative affect, affect, neuroticism, big five

features.name: worry_wrapped_up
features.coding:
Today, I was wrapped up in my worries.
1 = completely disagree 
7 = completely agree
features.details: Today, I was wrapped up in my worries.
features.source: Ambulatory Worry Scale
features.construct: worry, rumination, negative affect, affect, neuroticism, big five

features.name: mindfulness_open_to_happening
features.coding:
I opened myself up today to what was happening.
1 = completely disagree 
7 = completely agree
features.details: I opened myself up today to what was happening.
features.source: Multidimensional State Mindfulness Questionnaire (MSMQ)

features.name: mindfulness_inappropriate
features.coding:
Several times today I felt that what I was thinking, feeling or doing was slightly off. 
1 = not at all
7 = very
features.details: Several times today I felt that what I was thinking, feeling or doing was slightly off.
features.source: Multidimensional State Mindfulness Questionnaire (MSMQ)

features.name: mindfulness_present_moment
features.coding:
I focused my attention on the present moment today.
1 = not at all
7 = very
features.details: I focused my attention on the present moment today.
features.source: Multidimensional State Mindfulness Questionnaire (MSMQ)

features.name: mindfulness_could_act_better
features.coding:
I sometimes thought today that I could have acted more appropriately at a certain time.
1 = not at all
7 = very
features.details: I sometimes thought today that I could have acted more appropriately at a certain time.
features.source: Multidimensional State Mindfulness Questionnaire (MSMQ)

features.name: corona_info_update
features.coding:
How often did you update yourself about the corona pandemic today (e.g., by reading newspapers, watching the news, push notifications, online news)? 
1= not at all 
2= rarely
 3= sometimes 
4= often 
5= very often

features.labels:
1= not at all 
2= rarely
 3= sometimes 
4= often 
5= very often
